extDescription.message: Make sound response when events happen

options.sound.clickOrDropFile.message: Click or drop new sound here.
options.sound.clickOrDropFile.description: Droppable zone for upload new sound file.

options.btn.changeSound.description: When file already picked and player appear, user can click this button to switch to 'droppable' UI, to pick another file.

options.warning.unsupportedMedia.message:
This media type maybe unable to play.
$type$
options.warning.unsupportedMedia.description: When upload a file seems can't be played by <audio>, this warning is shown below the player.

options.title.btn.sound.moveBack.message: Move this sound backward from current position

options.title.btn.sound.moveNext.message: Move this sound afterward from current position

options.title.btn.event.moveUp.message: Move this event up from current position

options.title.btn.event.moveDown.message: Move this event down from current position

options.event.soundNotSet.description: If user didn't select a sound, Event table show this text for 'Sound' column.
